main.name: Sundeep Kakar
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Bachelors of Sciences in Computer Science. Double Minor in Math and Business (Kelley School of Business @ IUPUI).

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Develop Web Apps using PHP, WCMS. Build user interfaces using the IU Framework. Interact with clients to produce and deploy web apps. Maintain, update, and troubleshoot IU Framework & ASP.NET websites. Perform database(MySQL) maintenance and updates.

work.title: Teaching Assistant & Peer Leader
work.description: Teaching Assistant for CSCI 23000 - Computing 1, a 110+ student course. Lead recitations and discussions covering Python, APIs, and Web Apps (Bottle.py|SQL). Graded assignments, quizzes and final projects.

work.title: Technical Center Consultant
work.description: Provided direct technical assistance relating to software, hardware and computer peripherals. Assist campus instructors, customers, and campus housing residents.

work.title: Quantitative Trainer and Student Counselor
work.description: Over the course of this internship, I presented an academic course on the SAT Quantitative section, created and maintained documents/questionnaires, assisted and counseled 20+ students during the internship, and mentored potential international freshman about college transition.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
